topic: Impact of organizational culture on innovation in AI and renewable energy sectors
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that the recurring issues I observe are rooted in communication gaps and cultural dynamics within the organization. To address this, I will conduct a series of interviews and workshops with team members to better understand these dynamics and identify specific areas for improvement. This action will help create a more inclusive and collaborative environment, potentially uncovering new solutions and opportunities.

metadata.trigger: What pattern do I keep seeing that others might be missing?
